sentences.en: An unfriendly attitude of the shop - assistant often annoys customers.
sentences.cn: 售货员不友好冷淡的态度常常使顾客生气.

sentences.en: Before them lay the grey but not unfriendly sea.
sentences.cn: 在他们面前大海是灰色的,但并不是不欢迎他们的.

sentences.en: He was distinctly unfriendly towards me.
His tone was curt and unfriendly.
sentences.cn: 他说话的语调粗暴无礼。

sentences.en: It is not fair for him to be permanently unfriendly to someone who has hurt him.
sentences.cn: 他对伤害过自己的人永远存有敌意，这样是不对的。

sentences.en: It's couched in such very user-unfriendly terminology.
sentences.cn: 文中使用了令用户敬而远之的术语。

sentences.en: Judy spoke in a loud, rather unfriendly voice.
sentences.cn: 朱迪说话时声音很大，十分不友好。

sentences.en: On the unfriendly side of the mountain, the drum - roll continued.
sentences.cn: 在山的冷漠的一侧, 擂鼓 似的隆隆声还在不停地回荡.

sentences.en: Our neighbours are unfriendly to us.
sentences.cn: 我们的邻居对我们不友好.

sentences.en: Parisians on the street often looked worried, hurried and unfriendly.
sentences.cn: 巴黎街上的路人往往看上去忧心忡忡、匆匆忙忙而且不太友善。

sentences.en: People always complain that the big banks and big companies are unfriendly and unhelpful.
sentences.cn: 人们总是抱怨大银行和大公司不友善、不愿提供帮助。

sentences.en: Pubs are dirty, smelly and unfriendly, according to the Good Pub Guide.
sentences.cn: 据《好酒吧指南》所说，酒吧一般环境肮脏，气味难闻，而且气氛很不友好。

sentences.en: The old man looked cross and unfriendly.
sentences.cn: 老人看上去生气了，很不友好。

sentences.en: There's no need to be so unfriendly towards them.
sentences.cn: 没必要对他们这么不客气。

sentences.en: We thought he was unfriendly until we learned that he was shy.
sentences.cn: 本来我们认为他不友好,后来才知道他是害羞.

trans.tran_cn: 不友好的，有敌意的，冷漠的，不利的，（气候）不宜人的
